blogs.title: Is Justice Alito a Crit (or Just a Movement Conservative)?
blogs.summary: Given the larger current political environment, it is perhaps understandable a rather remarkable speech Justice Alito gave at the Claremont Institute in early February received relatively little media attention (Mark Joseph Stern excepted).
